# BITSY VERSION 5.1

! ROOM_FORMAT 1

PAL 0
255,255,128 ! 0 = bg, pass-through
0,10,180 ! 1 = tile, solid wall
10,250,150 ! 2 = sprite, shiny
20,200,90 ! 3 = glass
128,250,90 ! 4 = short obstacle
255,255,120 ! 7 = floor pattern
255,255,90 ! 6 = player
255,255,255

DLG SPR_0

{cycle

DLG ITM_0
You found a nice warm cup of tea

DLG CAR
"""
{cycle
 - Can't leave yet.
 - I just got here.
 - Dark out;{br}Good thing I keep a torch in the glovebox.
}
"""

DLG ROADBLOCK
"""
{cycle
 - I'm not headed out there on foot.
 - Nuh-uh.
 - No way.
 - I'm not walking all the way home.
}
"""

VAR a
